Name: Cable Television Public Access Channels
Title: To amend the New York City Charter in relation to the administration of cable television public access channels made available to the public pursuant to a franchise agreement or other authorization approved or administered by the department of information technology and telecommunications.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section one.  Chapter 48 of the New York City Charter is hereby amended by adding a new section 1075 to read as follows:
	�1075.  Cable Television Public Access Channels.  All entities responsible for the administration of cable television public access channels which are made available to the public pursuant to a franchise agreement or other authorization approved by or administered by the department shall display an on-screen message stating the name(s) and address(s) of the producer(s) of each program transmitted on such public access channel at the beginning and at the end of each such program.
	�2.	This local law shall take effect sixty days after its enactment into law.
	- 1 -
